about_the_game:
The city of Sentinel Point is in danger and needs a protector! Protect it in this superhero themed roguelike deckbuilder.

Spend time, not mana:

The game is turn based but every card costs time and you will have to wait for it to be ready - When a villain tries to punch, you better already be blocking. Weave in punches while they recover in a tactical battle where every turn matters!

Each run unique:

Each run you can choose one or two Archetypes such as Martial, Magic or Science to make the hero you want. You can also add a Aspect which adds extra cards - maybe your Magic User is also a mutant who can shapeshift? Did your Scientist learn how to become a speedster? 

Gain gear, training to modify cards, extra powers and even a sidekick over the course of a run to help you out! 

Be careful though, because every hero you can play as also has a villainous side and their own deck to battle against. Every run also has a dark power behind it lending them power - Will you find they are channelling the power of a dark god? Do they have a death ray swivelling in your direction? Battle them and find out!

Play your way:

The full game will come with a powerful mod maker which will let you make new cards, events, acts and more!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11, 64-bit versions only.
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs

short_description: A turn based, roguelike deck-builder where your cards cost time to play so you will need to plan ahead to win. The game features a high level of variability where you can combine power sources and change difficulty settings, or use mods to make it your own.
